actions.text: Amendments en bloc (A009) offered by Mr. Gordon (TN).
On agreeing to the Gordon (TN) amendments (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments numbered 14, 15, 16, 17, 22, 35, 42, 43, 49, 23, 24, 46, 48, and 9 printed in part B of House Report 111-479.
purpose: An amendment offered en bloc consisting of amendments numbered 14, 15, 16, 17, 22, 35, 42, 43, 49, 23, 24, 46, 78, and 9 printed in Part B of House Report 111-479.
